oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype image of Capt. James E. White, officer at Fort Negley
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hand-colored tintype of Capt. James E. White, 12th Ind. Lt. Arty., USA. Capt. White was the last commander of Ft. Negley. Orignally from Jeffersonville, Ind., White enlisted on December 9, 1861 as a Quartermaster Sgt. He was promoted to the rank of Capt. In April 1862. He resigned his position on January 5, 1865 due to "family affairs."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
